name: trucksbus-platform
description: TrucksBus - Commercial Vehicle Listing and E-Commerce Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.safe-commit: npm run lint && npm run build && git add . && git commit
scripts.reset-db: cd server && npx prisma db push && npx ts-node prisma/seed.ts
scripts.full-reset: npm run reset-db && npm run build
scripts.save-state: npm run chat-backup && npm run backup && git add . && git commit -m "Auto-save: Project state backup"
scripts.save-github: git add . && git commit -m "GitHub auto-save: $(date)" && git push origin master
scripts.safe-push: npm run lint && npm run build && git add . && git commit && git push origin master
scripts.restore-help: echo "RESTORE HELP: 1) Check chat-backups/ folder 2) Run 'npm run guard' 3) Use git log to find commits"
